content: That sounds amazing! I'm really interested in exploring more of Lin-Manuel Miranda's work. Speaking of community and the American Dream, I recently auditioned for a production of The Mousetrap and I'm really hoping to get in. I've been taking acting classes on Tuesday nights to improve my skills and I feel like I've made some real progress. Do you have any advice on how to prepare for a community theater production, especially if I do get cast in The Mousetrap?
